article_title: Dana Gas Could Recover Overdue Payment From Egypt by 2016
article_text:
SHARM EL SHEIKH, Egypt--Dana Gas, an energy firm based in the United Arab Emirates, could recover all of its outstanding arrears from the Egyptian government by next year, its Group Chief Executive Patrick Allman-Ward said.

“We are hoping that the Egyptian government can deliver on its promises of repaying the entire petroleum sector, and obviously Dana Gas, by 2016,” Mr. Allman-Ward told The Wall Street Journal in an interview in the...
